tls:text.tls:line: is not the constant Way,

sense.def: permanent, stable (often used for 常 for taboo reasons)

tls:text.tls:line: is not the constant Way,

sense.def: is not N

tls:text.tls:line: the more laws and ordinances are published,

sense.def: laws and orders

tls:text.tls:line: the more laws and ordinances are published,

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: If we make a simile for the Tao's place in the universe,

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven
psychological: take good personal and moral care of oneself> cultivate oneself
Foucault: soin de soi> take good care of oneself

tls:text.tls:line: he loves himself but he does not exalt himself,

sense.def: look well after oneself
putative: regard oneself as noble

tls:text.tls:line: beautiful words are not sincere.

sense.def: literary: aesthetically pleasing

tls:text.tls:line: Sincere words are not beautiful

sense.def: literary: be aestetically pleasing

tls:text.tls:line: there is nothing as good as [the methods of ] husbandry.

sense.def: parsimony, economy in the use of resources

tls:text.tls:line: means a doubling of the garnered virtue.

sense.def: more than once, a second time; doubly

tls:text.tls:line: means a doubling of the garnered virtue.

sense.def: accumulate abstract things

tls:text.tls:line: means a doubling of the garnered virtue.

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: What is brittle is easy to cleave.

sense.def: derived: be decomposed; be dismembered

tls:text.tls:line: What is brittle is easy to cleave.

sense.def: be easy to chew> crisp, tender and delicious 甘脆

tls:text.tls:line: What difference between good and bad?

sense.def: badness
resemble (in essence), be alike

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: this is called its Mystical virtue.

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: the virtue will be (true:) real,

sense.def: 日漸之德 "daily growing natural potential/Virtue" also 至德 "perfect Virtue"!!!: (greater or lesser) (one's) finite moral and spiritual potency; natural potential of excellence and Virtue

tls:text.tls:line: the virtue will be (true:) real,

sense.def: 日漸之德 "daily growing natural potential/Virtue" also 至德 "perfect Virtue"!!!: (greater or lesser) (one's) finite moral and spiritual potency; natural potential of excellence and Virtue

tls:text.tls:line: The one who amply possesses the virtue [of the Tao]

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: If you double your garnered virtue,

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: therefore their virtue is reciprocally applied.

sense.def: supreme cosmic potency; supreme cosmic force; supreme cosmic power

tls:text.tls:line: requite enmity with kindness,

sense.def: acts of benign tolerance and generosity

tls:text.tls:line: where armies have camped,

sense.def: 地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: it dwells in the place which all people detest (sc. the lowest).

sense.def: 地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: What other men teach,

sense.def: 地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: it is that by which the bad man is (protected:) preserved.

sense.def: 地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: One whom Heaven hates,

sense.def: 地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: of precious wares they have a surplus,

sense.def: have surplus> be more than enough

tls:text.tls:line: make men's hearts go mad;

sense.def: outrageous silliness, irresponsibility

tls:text.tls:line: Discard (study:)learning[sc. with its many futile disquisitions] and there will be no worry.

sense.def: the attempt to learn about things (typically from a teacher) study; the pursuit of intellectual/moral self-development; learning

tls:text.tls:line: The one who practises learning increases from day to day,

sense.def: engage in study

tls:text.tls:line: The one who practises learning increases from day to day,

sense.def: day by day, progressively, continuously more

tls:text.tls:line: The one who practises learning increases from day to day,

sense.def: grow, increase, become more; develop progressively

tls:text.tls:line: he who practises the Tao decreases from day to day,

sense.def: suffer loss, be reduced, get reduced; develop by way of decreasing one's activities

tls:text.tls:line: he decreases and again decreases,

sense.def: suffer loss, be reduced, get reduced; develop by way of decreasing one's activities

tls:text.tls:line: xue bu xue should be read xiao bu xiao (cf. Gl. 1759, Li Gl 164) he teaches without teaching,

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; try to acquire more knowledge

tls:text.tls:line: xue bu xue should be read xiao bu xiao (cf. Gl. 1759, Li Gl 164) he teaches without teaching,

sense.def: try to learn to VERB

tls:text.tls:line: The softest thing in the world

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: rushes against the hardest thing in the world.

sense.def: broadly geographic including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: All in the world know that the beautiful is beautiful,

sense.def: everyone in the world; mankind; all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the one who in estimating [things] considers his body as the equal of the realm,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: to him one can entrust the realm,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: the one who in his loving holds his body as the equal of the realm

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: to him one can entrust the realm.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: and is a pattern to all the world.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: therefore there is nobody in the world who can contend with him.

sense.def: oikoumenē, the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: it can have been the mother of the world.

sense.def: broadly geographic including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: with his person show lightness to the whole realm,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: will be the ravine (empty gorge) of all the world.

sense.def: broadly geographic including populations: all there is under Heaven

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: will be a pattern to all the world,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: will be the [empty] valley of all the world;

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: the one who intends and wishes to capture the realm, and [tries to] do it,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: The realm is a spiritual article;

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: does not with weapons force the realm.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world

tls:text.tls:line: in the whole world there is nobody who can treat it as a menial.

sense.def: oikoumenē, the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: and all the world will by itself become (settled:) restful.

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: all in the world go to him,

sense.def: everyone in the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world

tls:text.tls:line: princes and kings have reached the Unity and thereby become the directors of all the world.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: The myriad things in the world are born in Existence.

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: few in the world have come to apprehend it.

sense.def: everyone in the world; mankind; all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: purity and stillness is the norm for all the world.

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: When in the world there prevails the Tao,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: When Tao does not prevail in the world,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: one can know the world;

sense.def: oikoumenē, the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: one can know the world;

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: The one who would seize the realm, ought to (use:) practise the non-action.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: he does not deserve to seize the realm

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: The Sage has no constant (heart:) mind,

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: for the sake of the world he muddles his (heart) mind.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: to be considered to be the mother of the world;

sense.def: broadly geographic and cosmological including populations: all there is under Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: cultivate it in the realm,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: by the realm judge the realm.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: by the realm judge the realm.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore he will be honoured by all the world.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: by taking no actions one seizes the realm.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: If there are many prohibitions in the realm,

sense.def: everyone in the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world

tls:text.tls:line: If in accord with the Tao one governs the world,

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: it is where all the world concurs.

sense.def: everyone in the world; mankind; all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it is honoured by all the world.

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: The difficult matters in the world

sense.def: oikoumenē, the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: the great matters in the world

sense.def: oikoumenē, the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore all in the world delight to exalt him,

sense.def: everyone in the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world

sense.def: all the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world; the whole (civilised political) world；the (rule over the) entire (Han-dominated political) world; the Chinese political scene

tls:text.tls:line: hence in all the world there is nobody who could strive with him.

sense.def: everyone in the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world

tls:text.tls:line: All in the world say that my Tao is great

sense.def: everyone in the (civilised, i.e. Han-dominated) world

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth are not benevolent,

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:text.tls:line: The space between Heaven and Earth

sense.def: Heaven and Earth as cosmological cocstituents of the universe; the universe

tls:text.tls:line: The space between Heaven and Earth

sense.def: the world as a space (for all things)

tls:text.tls:line: is the root:) origin of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: Heaven and Earth (> everything/everywhere); the universe (consisting of Heaven and Earth); this world

tls:text.tls:line: The reason why they can be perpetual and durable

sense.def: Heaven and Earth as cosmological cocstituents of the universe; the universe

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is (long:) perpetual, Earth is durable.

sense.def: the (visible) sky (above), 天空

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is (long:) perpetual, Earth is durable.

sense.def: the earth, the ground

tls:text.tls:line: It is Heaven and Earth.

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:text.tls:line: When Heaven and Earth cannot make it long-lasting,

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:text.tls:line: born before Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: Heaven and Earth as cosmological cocstituents of the universe; the universe

tls:text.tls:line: born before Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: the limited stretch of time during which Heaven and Earth exist

tls:text.tls:line: heaven and earth unite to send down the sweet dew.

sense.def: Heaven and Earth as cosmological cocstituents of the universe; the universe

tls:text.tls:line: Having no name, it (Tao) is the beginning (origin) of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: the world (consisting of the things in Heaven and Earth); this world of things 郭象：萬物之總名也。成玄英：萬物者，自然之別稱。

tls:text.tls:line: one can know Heaven's Tao Way.

sense.def: law-of-Heaven-determined course of events in this world

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven's way has no favouritism,

sense.def: law-of-Heaven-determined course of events in this world

tls:text.tls:line: I thereby (through my emptiness and stillness), can see them return.

sense.def: we

sense.def: we

tls:text.tls:line: I do not know its [proper] name.

sense.def: we

sense.def: we

sense.def: we

sense.def: we

sense.def: we

tls:text.tls:line: then I would restrain them

sense.def: we

tls:text.tls:line: The highest class of masters,

sense.def: get to know about; learn about; learn (from an authoritative source) as true; CHECK ATTRIBUTIONS!

tls:text.tls:line: The middle class of masters, when they hear about the Tao,

sense.def: get to know about; learn about; learn to understand (from an authoritative source); CHECK ATTRIBUTIONS!

tls:text.tls:line: they practise it zealously.

sense.def: adverbialising suffix

tls:text.tls:line: they practise it zealously.

sense.def: diligently

tls:text.tls:line: The great Way (Tao) is overflowing,

sense.def: =氾 all-embracing in range

sense.def: ignominy;humiliating shame

tls:text.tls:line: Le sage redoute la gloire (​090) comme l'ignominie ;

sense.def: popularity; favourite status, favour; favourable treatment 有寵於

tls:text.tls:line: Celui qui n'imite pas le Tao ne tarde pas à périr (​274). ​

sense.def: be done for, be destroyed

tls:line.title: Le livre de la voie et de la vertu

tls:text.tls:line: Il rentre dans le non-être.

sense.def: the place where nothing is =無物之處/野/鄉

tls:text.tls:line: Ces trois qualités (​097) ne peuvent être scrutées à l'aide de la parole.

sense.def: reach so as to V
Threefold Minister; a senior minister

tls:line.title: Le livre de la voie et de la vertu

tls:text.tls:line: L'âme spirituelle (​065) doit commander à l'âme sensitive.

sense.def: the One; pristine unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "achieve oneness", 抱一 "embrace pristine Oneness"

tls:text.tls:line: have the one and only hub in common.

sense.def: the one and only

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is

sense.def: subjective motivation: thus it was; on these grounds; for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

sense.def: and thus; and along the same lines; and in view of this

tls:text.tls:line: tel est le guide de mon enseignement.

sense.def: guiding principle; (fatherly) philosophical principle and guide for life

tls:text.tls:line: It is not that he does not have any private interests,

sense.def: this is not because

tls:text.tls:line: Is this not because they have meanness as their root?

sense.def: this is not because

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: SUBJECT (not agent!) N subject of feature Nab

sense.def: 小人之學"the petty man's studies": N1=grammatical subject but not agent of N2
